snippet: Many of the passionate followers of teams in one of the nation’s premier football conferences are wary of change, even if the result is making the correct call.
abstract: Southeastern Conference football fans question motivation behind and potential consequences of league's new instant replay process; fans' passion fuels suspicion of effort that league insists is merely aimed at improving accuracy of calls.
lead_paragraph: Many of the passionate followers of teams in one of the nation’s premier football conferences are wary of change, even if the result is making the correct call.

headline.main: SEC’s Move to Clear the Air on Instant Replay Feeds Fans’ Cloud of Suspicion
headline.print_headline: SEC’s Move to Clear the Air on Instant Replay Feeds Fans’ Cloud of Suspicion
